name: Storabollar
description:
99% of all people can't beat this game. 

This game is guaranteed to make you rage and cry. 

- Use arrow keys to move left and right.
- The "Down" arrow key will stop the player's momentum.
- Spacebar or the "Up" arrow key to jump . Press R to reset the player to the beginning.
- Your goal is to get to the top.

THIS GAME IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT AND THE MAP IS NOT FULLY COMPLETED. UPON FULL RELEASE, THE MAP WILL BE COMPLETE AND OTHER MECHANICE/FUNCTIONS MAY BE ADDED. IF THERE'S ANY BUGS/ISSUES, LET ME KNOW AND I'LL FIX THEM ON THE NEXT RELEASE

Version 1.0
